title: Software Engineer
notes: Develop features in Java for the human machine interface (HMI) of the air traffic management system
Design and code supporting CSCIs for the HMI e.g. external application gateway server
Fix bugs and gaps in the solution identified by verification team
Write automated tests using the cucumber framework and Junit to run on jenkins
Derive and trace requirements from the SSS document to tests
Perform pre-verfication, application level integration testing
Review pull requests as the merge authority
Script micro-tools to speed up daily tasks

title: Software Engineer, Intern
notes: Design and prototype controller based innovation products
Demonstrate and pitch innovation products to visitors and management
Integrate existing ATM software into innovation products
